price: 221. Zal ik jullie vertellen op wie de duivels neerdalen?
arabic: هَلۡ أُنَبِّئُكُمۡ عَلَىٰ مَن تَنَزَّلُ ٱلشَّيَٰطِينُ

version.title: Dutch translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Dutch language, for the Dutch Islamic Center - in progress.

meta.transliteration: hal unabbi-ukum ʿalā man tanazzalu al-shayāṭīnu
